thread.title: JULIANNE
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by JULIANNE

author: JULIANNE
title: JULIANNE
text:
Cory Anderson was my agent. He allayed my uneasiness, and answered every question I had, even if it was a repeat. He was both professional and showed a very sincere interest in my situation. Cory told me this choice with my specific circumstances would make a profound change in my life. He was right. Your company is wonderful!
Thank you so much
A grateful client
